full_description: if there is one bread on the table, use one arm to grab the bread and put it into the skillet
schema: {A} notifies the skillet, {B} notifies the bread, {a} notifies the arm to grab the bread
preference: num of words should not exceed 10. Degree of detail avg is 6

template_example.visual_state_description: I can see a bread on the right of a table and a skillet on the left of the table.
template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. The assistant info provides the arm pose to hold the skillet and the target functional point on skillet for bread to be placed. I will use them to hold the skillet and place the bread. The skillet is on the left side, so I will grasp it first with left arm and grasp bread with right arm.
template_example.language_plan: I will grasp the skillet first with left arm and grasp bread with right arm. And then lift them up to avoid collision with the other objects and adjust its posture. After that, I will move left arm(with skillet) to ideal position and pose according to assistant info. After that, I will use another right arm to place the bread to the skillet.

parameters.z: ...(SOME FLOAT VALUE THROUGH YOUR OBSERVATION AND THINKING)...
